newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine bonds slightly lower in thin activity.
newsitem.headline: Argentine bonds slightly lower in thin activity.

text.p: Argentine bonds were slightly lower late morning Wednesday as the market drifted in very thin activity.
"There is nothing happening today," said a trader at a local bank.
Argentina's FRB Brady bond due 2005 was down 1/8 at 93-3/4 while the dollar-denominated Bocon Previsional 4 due 2002 was flat at 117.40.
Another trader said there was no market-moving news this session, leaving bonds to drift until U.S. economic indicator releases later in the week.
"We need something new to move the market decisively," said the trader.
